title: About front-end display bugs
body:
How to reproduce the behavior
---------
<!-- Before submitting an issue, make sure to check the docs and closed issues and FAQ to see if any of the solutions work for you. https://github.com/doccano/doccano/wiki/Frequently-Asked-Questions -->

<!-- Include a code example or the steps that led to the problem. Please try to be as specific as possible. -->

Your Environment
---------
<!-- Include details of your environment.-->
*   Operating System:windows 10
*   Python Version Used: 3.9
*   When you install doccano: 2022.06.07
*   How did you install doccano (Heroku button etc):  pip install

Hello, thanks for the software you developed, we found a bug while using this software. When there are many lines connected to the marked relationship, the interface display is not complete. Hope to hear from you.
![684d999b47a2997d385c031680ebea2](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/40120224/172353555-a2b7fe93-ea00-4a12-b79a-7db7a84a6a0a.png)
